00027 // Note To Mods //
00028 /*
00029 Please do not change anything here and release it..
00030 There is going to be a new forum created just for the Kademlia side of the client..
00031 If you feel there is an error or a way to improve something, please
00032 post it in the forum first and let us look at it.. If it is a real improvement,
00033 it will be added to the offical client.. Changing something without knowing
00034 what all it does can cause great harm to the network if released in mass form..
00035 Any mod that changes anything within the Kademlia side will not be allowed to advertise
00036 there client on the eMule forum..
00037 */
00038 
00039 #ifndef __CONTACT_H__
00040 #define __CONTACT_H__
00041 
00042 #include "../kademlia/Kademlia.h"
00043 #include "../utils/KadUDPKey.h"
00044 
00046 namespace Kademlia {
00048 
00049 class CContact
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     ~CContact();
00053     CContact(const CUInt128 &clientID,
00054         uint32_t ip, uint16_t udpPort, uint16_t tcpPort, uint8_t version,
00055         const CKadUDPKey& kadKey, bool ipVerified,
00056         const CUInt128 &target = CKademlia::GetPrefs()->GetKadID());
00057 
00058     CContact(const CContact& k1);
00059 
00060     const CUInt128& GetClientID() const throw()     { return m_clientID; }
00061     void SetClientID(const CUInt128& clientID) throw()  { m_clientID = clientID; m_distance = CKademlia::GetPrefs()->GetKadID() ^ clientID; }
00062 
00063     const wxString GetClientIDString() const        { return m_clientID.ToHexString(); }
00064 
00065     const CUInt128& GetDistance() const throw()     { return m_distance; }
00066     const wxString GetDistanceString() const        { return m_distance.ToBinaryString(); }
00067 
00068     uint32_t GetIPAddress() const throw()           { return m_ip; }
00069     void     SetIPAddress(uint32_t ip) throw()      { if (m_ip != ip) { SetIPVerified(false); m_ip = ip; } }
00070 
00071     uint16_t GetTCPPort() const throw()         { return m_tcpPort; }
00072     void     SetTCPPort(uint16_t port) throw()      { m_tcpPort = port; }
00073 
00074     uint16_t GetUDPPort() const throw()         { return m_udpPort; }
00075     void     SetUDPPort(uint16_t port) throw()      { m_udpPort = port; }
00076 
00077     uint8_t  GetType() const throw()            { return m_type; }
00078 
00079     void     UpdateType() throw();
00080     void     CheckingType() throw();
00081 
00082     bool     InUse() const throw()              { return m_inUse > 0; }
00083     void     IncUse() throw()               { m_inUse++; }
00084     void     DecUse()                   { if (m_inUse) m_inUse--; else { wxFAIL; } }
00085 
00086     time_t   GetCreatedTime() const throw()         { return m_created; }
00087 
00088     void     SetExpireTime(time_t value) throw()        { m_expires = value; }; 
00089     time_t   GetExpireTime() const throw()          { return m_expires; }
00090 
00091     time_t   GetLastTypeSet() const throw()         { return m_lastTypeSet; }
00092 
00093     time_t   GetLastSeen() const throw();
00094 
00095     uint8_t  GetVersion() const throw()         { return m_version; }
00096     void     SetVersion(uint8_t value) throw()      { m_version = value; }
00097 
00098     const CKadUDPKey& GetUDPKey() const throw()     { return m_udpKey; }
00099     void     SetUDPKey(const CKadUDPKey& key) throw()   { m_udpKey = key; }
00100 
00101     bool     IsIPVerified() const throw()           { return m_ipVerified; }
00102     void     SetIPVerified(bool ipVerified) throw()     { m_ipVerified = ipVerified; }
00103 
00104     bool    GetReceivedHelloPacket() const throw()      { return m_receivedHelloPacket; }
00105     void    SetReceivedHelloPacket() throw()        { m_receivedHelloPacket = true; }
00106 
00107 private:
00108     CUInt128    m_clientID;
00109     CUInt128    m_distance;
00110     uint32_t    m_ip;
00111     uint16_t    m_tcpPort;
00112     uint16_t    m_udpPort;
00113     uint8_t     m_type;
00114     time_t      m_lastTypeSet;
00115     time_t      m_expires;
00116     time_t      m_created;
00117     uint32_t    m_inUse;
00118     uint8_t     m_version;
00119     bool        m_ipVerified;
00120     bool        m_receivedHelloPacket;
00121     CKadUDPKey  m_udpKey;
00122 };
00123 
00124 } // End namespace
00125 
00126 #endif // __CONTACT_H__
